snippet: Lackluster news on retail sales and jobs, and an increase in oil prices in the wake of violent eruptions in Iraq, depressed the stock market.
abstract: Stock markets fall sharply on combination of tepid economic news and rise of violence in Iraq.
lead_paragraph: Lackluster news on retail sales and jobs, and an increase in oil prices in the wake of violent eruptions in Iraq, depressed the stock market.

headline.main: Market Falls Sharply on Tepid Economic News and Strife in Iraq
headline.print_headline: Market Falls Sharply on Tepid Economic News and Strife in Iraq
